projects.title: Featured Projects
projects.description: A collection of my recent design work focusing on user research, interface design, and speculative thinking

luxe-threads.title: Luxe & Threads
luxe-threads.subtitle: E-commerce Fashion Platform
luxe-threads.description: End-to-end design for a contemporary fashion brand, from information architecture to high-fidelity prototypes. Focus on editorial layouts and seamless checkout experience.
highlights: User flow optimization reducing cart abandonment

campus-connect.title: Campus Connect
campus-connect.subtitle: Student App - Sorbonne Jussieu
campus-connect.description: Student-centered app design backed by extensive user research. Conducted 12 user interviews with neutral protocol to identify real pain points in campus life.
highlights: Collaborative features based on student feedback

methodology.testing: Moderated usability tests with think-aloud protocol
methodology.iterations: 3 rounds of testing with 5 students each

eduwatch.title: EduWatch
eduwatch.subtitle: Dystopian School Surveillance Tool
eduwatch.description: Speculative design project exploring the ethics of educational surveillance. Pitched as a corporate product to provoke discussion on privacy and control in learning environments.
eduwatch.lore: In 2034, SchoolTech Corp introduces EduWatch: a neural implant promising 'optimized learning outcomes' through constant biometric monitoring. Our agency presents the product vision.
